comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "Only the empty hulks remain as a mute testimony of carelessness on the highways of an estimated 1,000 cars which cover some seven and one-half acres at the Harrison Auto Yard on the Woodville Hwy, the final resting place for the great majority of the wrecked vehicles."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
